price: 50.Xagaral Ion ken sari gira kiciniy Qhatraan deqsitak yan, ken foocitte gira buultaah tet carrissa.
arabic: سَرَابِيلُهُم مِّن قَطِرَانٖ وَتَغۡشَىٰ وُجُوهَهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: sarābīluhum min qaṭirānin wataghshā wujūhahumu al-nāru
